nodes.text: First Days on Tython was an account of the Jedi Order's exploration of their recently rediscovered homeworld of Tython during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Published sometime after Tython's rediscovery in 3651 BBY, First Days was among a list of suggested texts for Jedi Padawans to read during the Cold War.
First Days on Tython was first mentioned in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia, in a list of suggested texts in the section on Jedi Consulars.
